product_name: The North Face Point Five NG Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Point Five NG jacket helps keep you dry and guarded against harsh weather while climbing, hiking or simply venturing down the road in cold, challenging climates. Gore-Tex(R) Pro Shell three-layer laminate fabric is tough, extremely breathable and durably waterproof and windproof. Polyester micro-grid lining adds wicking benefit to move moisture away from you during intense activities. Attached helmet-compatible hood is fully adjustable. Pit zippers let you vent body heat quickly. The North Face Point Five NG jacket features two zippered hand pockets that work well with a pack. Molded cuffs and a drawcord hem seal out the weather.
short_description: The North Face Point Five NG jacket helps keep you dry and guarded against harsh weather while climbing, hiking or simply venturing down the road in cold, challenging climates.
